document.full_text: hertz's new ad campaign features a mascot named horatio brought to life by the actor owen wilson, whose voice is featured in the coming animated film 'cars 2.'
document.title: advertising: hertz uses mascot in effort to make rental cars cool
lines_and_colors: hertz's new ad campaign features a mascot named horatio brought to life by the actor owen wilson, whose voice is featured in the coming animated film 'cars 2.'
